description: Updates cluster broker volume size (or) sets cluster storage mode to TIERED.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster to be updated.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The version of cluster to update from. A successful operation will then generate a new version.

parameters.name: ProvisionedThroughput
parameters.description: EBS volume provisioned throughput information. Enabled (boolean) --- Provisioned throughput is enabled or not. VolumeThroughput (integer) --- Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Provisioned throughput is enabled or not.

nested_params.name: VolumeThroughput
nested_params.description: Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
